tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_performance (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255),
  league_standings INT,
  wins INT,
  losses INT,
  goals_scored INT
);

CREATE TABLE league_standings (
 team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_name VARCHAR(255),
 wins INT,
 losses INT,
 goals_scored INT
);

CREATE TABLE match_results (
 match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_id INT,
 opponent_id INT,
 result VARCHAR(50),
 goals_scored INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES league_standings(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT,
    home_team VARCHAR(255),
    away_team VARCHAR(255),
    home_goals INT,
    away_goals INT
);

CREATE TABLE LeagueStandings (
    team_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    standing INT,
    wins INT,
    losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE Matches (
    match_id INT,
    date DATE,
    home_team_id INT,
    away_team_id INT,
    home_team_score INT,
    away_team_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE GoalsScored (
    goal_id INT,
    match_id INT,
    team_id INT,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    goal_minute INT
);
